translate: The snow falls gracefully with the wind, and I am not tired of watching it; more fearing that it will cover the forested hills. The sorrowful person is just beneath the window, as a piece flies in, bringing a touch of coldness.

poem:
雪嶺金河獨向東，吳山楚澤意無窮。
如今白首鄉心盡，萬里歸程在夢中。
translate: Snow-capped mountains and golden rivers, I journey alone to the east; The lush forests of Wu and Chu evoke endless thoughts. Now with white hair, my hometown longing is fulfilled; A thousand miles of homecoming lies in dreams.

poem: 不知誰會喃喃語，必向王前報太平。
translate: Who knows who is whispering, must report peace before the king.

poem:
寒食悲看郭外春，野田無處不傷神。
平原纍纍添新塚，半是去年來哭人。
translate: Sad to watch the spring outside the city walls during the cold food festival, everywhere in the fields is heartbreaking. New graves are piling up on the flat land, half of them were wept for last year.

poem:
日日爲詩苦，誰論春與秋。
一聯如得意，萬事總忘憂。
雨墮花臨砌，風吹竹近樓。
不吟頭也白，任白此生頭。
translate: I write poetry day after day, who cares about spring and autumn? A couplet is satisfying, all worries are forgotten. Raindrops fall on the flowers near the wall, the wind blows through the bamboo near the building. Without reciting poetry, my hair turns white, letting this life turn white with age.

poem:
一百八十首，清泠韻可敲。
任從人不愛，終是我難拋。
桂魄吟來滿，蒲團坐得凹。
先生聲價在，寰宇幾人抄。
translate: One hundred eighty poems, clear and cool tones can be tapped. Although no one may love them, they are hard for me to let go. The moon's spirit sings fullness, the mat sits in a depression. Mr.'s reputation is there, a few people in the world copy it.

poem:
此臺如可廢，此恨有誰平。
縱使迷青草，終難沒舊名。
天悲朝雨色，嶽哭夜猨聲。
不是心偏苦，應關自古情。
translate: If this platform can be abandoned, who will balance this hatred? Even if lost in the green grass, it is difficult to hide its old name. The heavens weep for the morning rain, and the mountains cry with the night monkeys' cries. It's not that the heart is particularly bitter, but it should be related to ancient emotions.

poem:
一著讒書未快心，幾抽胸臆縱狂吟。
管中窺豹我猶在，海上釣鼇君也沈。
歲月盡能消憤懣，寰區那更有知音。
長安冠蓋皆塗地，仍喜先生葬碧岑。
translate: After reading the slanderous letter, my heart is still uneasy; I can't help but rage and recite poetry. Like a leopard in a cage, I am confined; My friend who fishes for giant clams is also lost at sea. Time can ease my anger, but who else understands my poetry? In Chang'an, all the dignitaries are corrupt; Fortunately, Mr. Li Bai was buried on the green mountains.

poem:
羞容難更返江東，誰問從來百戰功。
天地有心歸道德，山河無力爲英雄。
蘆花尚認霜戈白，海日猶思火陣紅。
也是男兒成敗事，不須惆悵對西風。
translate: The shy expression is hard to return to the east river, who asks about the achievements of a hundred battles from the past. The universe has a heart to return to morality, and the mountains and rivers are powerless to be heroes. Reeds still recognize the frost and the sea sun still thinks of the red fire array. It's also a matter of success or failure for men, no need to sigh in the face of the west wind.

poem:
三春堪惜牡丹奇，半倚朱欄欲綻時。
天上更無花勝此，人間偏得貴相宜。
偷香黑蟻斜穿葉，覷蕋黃蜂倒挂枝。
除却解禪心不動，算應狂殺五陵兒。
translate: In the spring, the peonies are remarkable, half leaning on the red rails as they bloom. There is no flower in heaven that can surpass it, and it is particularly fitting for people of high status. The stealing-scent ants creep through the leaves at an angle, while the yellow honey bees hang from branches to gaze at the blossoms. Except for those who understand Zen and keep their hearts still, it should drive the young nobles crazy.

poem:
舊居梨嶺下，風景近炎方。
地暖生春早，家貧覺歲長。
石房雲過濕，杉徑雨餘香。
日夕竟無事，詩書聊自強。
translate: Residing below the pear mountain, the scenery is close to the tropical region. The warmth of the earth brings early spring, and poverty makes one feel the passage of time is long. The stone house is wet from the clouds, and the pine path has a lingering fragrance from the rain. Day and night pass without incident, and one reads poetry and books to pass the time.

poem:
寄居江島邊，閑詠見秋殘。
草白牛羊瘦，風高猨鳥寒。
檢方醫故疾，挑薺備中餐。
時復停書卷，鉏莎種木蘭。
translate: Residing by the river island, leisurely reciting to see the fading autumn. Grass is white, cattle and sheep are thin, the wind is high, and the gibbons and birds are cold. Examining prescriptions for old illnesses, picking leeks for lunch. Occasionally pausing to read books, cultivating iris and planting magnolias.

poem:
故園梨嶺下，歸路接天涯。
生作長安草，勝爲邊地花。
雁南飛不到，書北寄來賒。
堪羨神仙客，青雲早致家。
translate: Under the pear hills of the old garden, the homeward path extends to the edge of the world. Born as a grass in Chang'an, I am better off than a flower in the frontier. The wild geese do not fly southward, and the letters from the north arrive late. Envy the immortal guests, who have already established their homes in the blue clouds.

poem:
去去玉關路，省君曾未行。
塞深多伏寇，時靜亦屯兵。
雪每先秋降，花嘗近夏生。
閑陪射鵰將，應到受降城。
translate:
Gone are the paths to Yu Pass, I have never been there with you.
There are many hidden bandits in the deep passes, and troops are stationed even during quiet times.
Snow falls before autumn arrives, and flowers bloom near summer.
I will accompany the archer general leisurely, and we should reach the receiving city soon.

poem:
路逢一老翁，兩鬢白如雪。
一里二里行，四回五回歇。
translate: Along the road, I meet an old man with silver hair like snow. A mile, two miles he walks, four times, five times he rests.

poem:
牧童見人俱不識，盡着芒鞋戴篛笠。
朝陽未出衆山晴，露滴蓑衣猶半濕。
二月三月時，平原草初綠。
三箇五箇騎羸牛，前村後村來放牧。
笛聲纔一舉，衆稚齊歌舞。
看看白日向西斜，各自騎牛又歸去。
translate: The shepherd boy sees people he doesn't know, all wearing straw sandals and bamboo hats. The sun has not yet risen, and the mountains are still bright. Drizzle drips from his wet cloak in early February and March, when the meadows turn green. Three or five children ride weak cows, coming to graze in front and back villages. As soon as the flute sounds, they start dancing and singing together. As the sun sets, they ride their cows back home.

poem:
居游正值芳春月，蜀道千山皆秀發。
溪邊十里五里花，雲外三峯兩峰雪。
君上匡山我舊居，松蘿拋擲十年餘。
君行試到山前問，山鳥只今相憶無。
translate: In the spring month, I am traveling and enjoying the beauty of the land; The thousand mountains of Shu Road are all adorned with lush greenery. Along the creek, flowers bloom for ten li every day, and beyond the clouds, three peaks have two covered in snow. You once lived on the Kong Mountain, and I left behind the pines and ivy for over a decade. If you visit the mountain, ask the birds if they still remember us - they may have memories of our past.

poem:
七條絲上寄深意，澗水松風生十指。
自乃知音猶尚稀，欲教更入何人耳。
translate: On the seven threads, deep meanings are woven; through the creek and pine wind, fingers play. Yet few can appreciate these tunes; who else should hear them but you?

poem:
橫壓驚波防沒溺，當初元剏是軍機。
行人到此全無滯，一片江雲踏欲飛。
translate: Crossing the surging waves to prevent drowning, it all started from military tactics. Travelers pass through without hesitation, stepping on the river clouds as if they were flying.

poem:
佛寺孤莊千嶂間，我來詩境強相關。
巖邊樹動猿下澗，雲裏錫鳴僧上山。
松月影寒生碧落，石泉聲亂噴潺湲。
明朝更躡層霄去，誓共煙霞到老閑。
translate: In the solitary Zen monastery among a thousand peaks, I come to this poetic landscape and strongly relate it. Monkeys descend the streams beside the rocks as trees sway, and monks ascend the mountains with their prayer bells ringing in the clouds. The pines and moon cast cold shadows on the verdant heavens, while stone springs rush and gurgle in disorder. Tomorrow I will further explore the vast skies, vowing to spend my old age in leisure and companionship with the mist and clouds.

poem:
六幅故牢健，知君恣筆蹤。
不求千澗水，止要兩株松。
樹下留盤石，天邊縱遠峰。
近巖幽濕處，惟藉墨煙濃。
translate: Six pictures, old and strong, reveal your freehand brushwork. Not seeking a thousand streams, just two pine trees will do. Leave a rock beneath the trees, let distant peaks soar in the sky. Near the rocks, the secluded dampness is embraced by the rich ink smoke.

poem:
家在閩山西復西，其中歲歲有鶯啼。
如今不在鶯啼處，鶯在舊時啼處啼。
translate: Home is in the west of Mt. Minshan, where there are singing orioles year after year. Now that I'm not in the place where the orioles used to sing, they are singing in the old places.

poem:
家在閩山東復東，其中歲歲有花紅。
而今不在花紅處，花在舊時紅處紅。
translate: My home is in the east of Mingshan, where there is always a touch of redness every year. Now that I am not at the place with redness, the flowers are still red as before.

poem:
虛著褐衣老，浮杯道不成。
誓傳經論死，不染利名生。
厭樹遮山色，憐窗向月明。
他時隨范蠡，一棹五湖清。
translate: Wearing simple brown robes, I grow old; drifting with the cups, my path is uncertain. Swearing to pass on scriptural teachings until death, untouched by worldly fame and wealth. Tired of trees blocking the mountain's beauty, I cherish the moonlight shining through the window. In time, I shall follow Fan Li, sailing across the five lakes in serenity.

poem:
靈異不能棲鳥雀，幽奇終不着猿猱。
爲經巢賊應無損，縱使秦驅也謾勞。
珍重昔賢留像迹，陵遷谷變自堅牢。
translate: The strange and eerie land cannot support birds and squirrels; the secluded and mysterious place is not suitable for monkeys. There should be no damage from the passing of the thieves, even if the pursuit by the Qin Dynasty is in vain. Cherishing the past heroes' legacy, we can withstand the changes of the tomb's relocation and the valley's transformation.

poem:
山色沈沈，松煙羃羃。
空林之下，盤陀之石。
石上有僧，結跏橫膝。
誦白蓮經，從旦至夕。
左之右之，虎跡狼跡。
十片五片，異花狼籍。
偶然相見，未深相識。
知是古之人，今之人？是曇彥，是曇翼？
我聞此經有深旨，覺帝稱之有妙義。
合目冥心子細聽，醍醐滴入焦腸裏。
佛之意兮祖之髓，我之心兮經之旨。
可憐彈指及舉手，不達目前今正是。
大矣哉！甚奇特。
空王要使羣生得，光輝一萬八千土。
土土皆作黃金色，四生六道一光中。
狂夫猶自問彌勒，我亦當年學空寂。
一得無心便休息，今日親聞誦此經。
始覺驢乘匪端的，我亦當年不出戶。
不欲紅塵沾步武，今日親聞誦此經。
始覺行行皆寶所，我亦當年愛吟詠。
將謂冥搜亂神定，今日親聞誦此經。
何妨筆硯資真性，我亦當年狎兒戲。
將謂光陰半虛棄，今日親聞誦此經。
始覺聚沙非小事，我昔曾游山與水。
將謂他山非故里，今日親聞誦此經。
始覺山河無寸地，我昔心猿未調伏。
常將金鎖虛拘束，今日親聞誦此經。
始覺無物爲拳拲，師誦此經經一字。
字字爛嚼醍醐味，醍醐之味珍且美。
不在脣，不在齒，只在勞生方寸裏。
師誦此經經一句，句句白牛親動步，白牛之步疾如風。
不在西，不在東，只在浮生日用中，日用不知一何苦。
酒之腸，飯之腑，長者揚聲喚不迴。
何異聾，何異瞽，世人之耳非不聰，耳聰特向經中聾。
世人之目非不明，目明特向經中盲。
合聰不聰，合明不明。
轆轤上下，浪死虛生。
世人縱識師之音，誰人能識師之心。
世人縱識師之形，誰人能識師之名。
師名醫王行佛令，來與衆生治心病。
能使迷者醒，狂者定，垢者淨，邪者正，凡者聖，如是則非但天恭敬。
人恭敬，亦合龍讚詠。
鬼讚詠，佛讚詠，豈得背覺合塵之徒，不稽首而歸命。
translate: The mountain colors are deep, the pines' smoke is dense. Under the empty forest, on the twisted stone. There is a monk on the stone, sitting in lotus position with his legs crossed and his hands resting on his knees. He recites the White Lotus Sutra from dawn to dusk. To the left and to the right, there are tiger and wolf tracks. Ten pieces and five pieces, different flowers are scattered about. Occasionally meeting each other, not yet deeply acquainted. Knowing if they are ancient people or present-day people, if they are Tanyan or Tanyi? I heard this sutra has profound meaning, and it seems that the emperor praises it for its subtlety. Closing my eyes and meditating, I listen carefully, as nectar drips into my burning intestines. The meaning of Buddha and the marrow of ancestors, my heart and the meaning of the scripture. Alas, it is just a matter of tapping your fingers or raising your hand, and you do not understand what is happening now. Great indeed! How extraordinary. The emptiness king wants all living beings to have, shining in 18,000 lands. Every land turns yellow and golden, and all four births and six paths shine in one light. Even the madman still asks Maitreya, "I also studied emptiness back then. As soon as I get rid of my mind, I rest. Today, I hear this sutra recited personally. I just realized that riding a donkey is not the end, and I didn't go out of the door back then. I don't want the red dust to touch my footsteps. Today, I hear this sutra recited personally. I just realize that every step is a treasure, and I loved reciting and composing poems back then. I thought that searching blindly was confusing and distracting, and today I hear this sutra recited. It doesn't matter if you use pens and ink to support your true nature, and I played with children back then. I thought that time was half wasted, and today I hear this sutra recited. I just realized that gathering sand is not a small matter, and I once visited mountains and waters. I thought that another mountain was not my hometown, and today I hear this sutra recited. I just realized that there is no inch of land in mountains and rivers, and my monkey mind was not tamed. I used to think that locking up empty was meaningless, and today I hear this sutra recited. I just realized that there is nothing to be confined like fists, and the teacher recites this sutra word by word. Each word is chewed like nectar, and the taste of nectar is precious and delicious. Not on the lips, not on the teeth, but in the life-long heart. The teacher recites this sutra sentence by sentence, and every sentence is a white ox moving quickly like the wind. Not in the west or east, but in daily life, which we don't know how bitter it is. Like wine entering the intestines, rice entering the abdomen, the elder calls out loudly without turning back. It's like being deaf or blind, and people's ears aren't particularly sharp, their ears are especially deafened by the scriptures. People's eyes are not particularly bright, their eyes are especially blinded by the scriptures. Combining hearing and not hearing, combining clarity and confusion. Pulleys up and down, and vainly die. Although people may recognize the teacher's voice, who can understand the teacher's heart? Although people may recognize the teacher's appearance, who can identify the name of the teacher? The teacher's name is King of Medicine and Buddha's order, coming to treat people's mental diseases. Can make those who are confused awake, those who are crazy calm, those who are dirty clean, those who are evil righteous, those who are ordinary holy. If so, it will not only be respected by heaven, but also by dragons, ghosts, and buddhas. How can those who turn their backs on consciousness and mix with dust bow their heads and pay their lives?

poem:
酒禿酒禿，何榮何辱。
但見衣冠成古丘，不見江河變陵谷。
translate: Alas, alas, what glory and what shame. Only the clothing and crowns have become ancient mounds, never seeing the rivers and streams change to valleys.

poem:
九疊嵯峨倚着天，悔隨寒瀑下巖煙。
深秋猨鳥來心上，夜靜松杉到眼前。
書架想遭苔蘚[裹]，石窗應被薜蘿纏。
一枝筇竹游江北，不見爐峰二十年。
translate: Towering and steep, the Nine Folded Mountains lean on heaven; Regretfully following the cold waterfall down to the rock mist. In the late autumn, the monkeys and birds come to my heart; At night, the quiet pines and firs appear before my eyes. I imagine the bookshelves are wrapped in moss; The stone windows should be entwined with grape ivy. With a cane, I travel the north bank of the river; Twenty years have passed since I last saw the fiery peak.

poem:
樂氏騎龍上碧天，東吳遺宅尚依然。
悟來大道無多事，真後丹元不值錢。
老樹夜風蟲咬葉，古垣春雨蘚生甎。
松傾鶴死桑田變，華表歸鄉未有年。
translate: On the dragon, Le Zi rides to the azure sky,The remnants of the Eastern Wu estate remain.Understanding the great path, there's not much to do,True elixir is not worth money after all.In the night wind, old trees and insects gnaw at the leaves,Moss grows on the ancient walls and bricks in the spring rain.Pines lean, cranes die, and the sand field changes,There is no year for returning to our hometown on the memorial pillar.

poem:
軒后紅爐獨鑄成，蘚痕磨落月輪呈。
萬般物象皆能鑒，一箇人心不可明。
匣內乍開鸞鳳活，臺前高挂鬼神驚。
百年肝膽堪將比，祗怕看頻素髮生。
translate: The red furnace was uniquely cast after the carriage, with the moon's wheels presented by polished moss stains. All things can be seen, but a single heart cannot be understood. The phoenix and birds suddenly open in the box, and the ghosts and gods are startled high on the stage. For a hundred years, the liver and gall can be compared, just fearing frequent viewing, causing hair to turn gray.

poem:
木平山裏人，貌古年復少。
相看陌路同，論心秋月皎。
懷衲線非蠶，助歌聲有鳥。
城闕今日來，一謳曾已曉。
translate: In the peaceful mountains, a man with an ancient appearance and young spirit. Gazing at each other on a unfamiliar path, sharing their hearts as the bright moonlight shines through the autumn sky. His robe is made of non-silk threads, while birds contribute to his songs. Today the city gates appear, awakening him with a joyful song.

poem:
白蘋紅蓼碧江涯，日暖雙雙立睡時。
願揭金籠放歸去，却隨沙鶴鬬輕絲。
translate: White scum and red kudzu on the azure riverbank, warm in the sun, two lovebirds stand and sleep. I wish to remove the golden cage and let you go free, to follow the sand geese and fight with light threads.

poem:
千愁萬恨過花時，似向春風怨別離。
若使衆禽俱解語，一生懷抱有誰知。
translate: Thousands of sorrows and ten thousand hatreds pass through the flowers, as if complaining about parting in the spring breeze. If all birds could speak, who would understand my feelings all my life?

poem:
長截隣雞叫五更，數般名字百般聲。
饒伊搖舌先知曉，也待青天明即鳴。
translate:
At the fifth watch, the neighboring rooster crows long and cut off, 
Various names and sounds in various ways. 
Even if you predict the dawn with your chattering tongue, 
You will wait for the bright sky to become clear.

poem:
擁衲對芳叢，由來事不同。
鬢從今日白，花似去年紅。
豔異隨朝露，馨香逐曉風。
何須對零落，然後始知空。
translate: Embracing the robe, I face the fragrant cluster; since our beginnings, things have been different. My temples have turned white today, like last year's flowers, red still. The vibrant beauty follows the morning dew, while the fragrance trails the morning breeze. Why should we wait for decay to realize the emptiness?

poem:
有美一人兮，婉如青揚。
識曲別音兮，令姿煌煌。
繡袂捧琴兮，登君子堂。
如彼萱草兮，使我憂忘。
欲贈之以紫玉尺，白銀鐺，久不見之兮，湘水茫茫。
translate: There is a beautiful person, as graceful as the green willow. Recognizing the melody and distinguishing the tone, her charming posture shines brightly. With a silk sleeve holding a guitar, she enters the gentleman's hall. Just like that daisy, she makes my worries disappear. I want to present her with a purple jade ruler and a white silver kettle, but due to a long absence, the Xiang River is vast and unknown.

poem:
湘江濱，湘江濱，蘭紅芷白波如銀，終須一去呼湘君。
問湘神，雲中君，不知何以交靈均。
我恐湘江之魚兮，死後盡爲人。
曾食靈均之肉兮，箇箇爲忠臣。
又想靈均之骨兮終不曲，千年波底色如玉。
誰能入水少取得，香沐函題貢上國。
貢上國，即全勝和璞懸瓈，垂棘結綠。
translate: By the banks of the Xiang River, by the banks of the Xiang River, red orchids and white wormwoods wave like silver, eventually I must leave to call on the Lord of the Xiang. Question the Lord of the Clouds, the Lord of the Clouds, I do not know how to meet Língjūn. I fear that the fish in the Xiang River will all become people after they die. They once ate Língjūn's flesh, each one a loyal minister. I also think that Língjūn's bones are finally straight, and their colors are like jade for a thousand years. Who can enter the water slightly to obtain it, and present it as a gift to the country with its fragrance and bath. Present it to the country, which is all victorious and pearls hanging from agate, with verticle berry and green.

poem:
爲口莫學阮嗣宗，不言是非非至公。
爲手須似朱雲輩，折檻英風至今在。
男兒結髮事君親，須斅前賢多慷慨。
歷數雍熙房與杜，魏公姚公宋開府。
盡向天上仙宮閑處坐，何不却辭上帝下下土？
忍見蒼生苦苦苦。
translate: Do not learn from Ruan Si Zong, speak no nonsense to be completely fair. Be like Zhu Yun's generation, the heroic spirit of breaking the rails remains to this day. As a man, you must serve your parents and the emperor, learning from the virtues of past heroes. Counting the peaceful and prosperous houses of Yang and Du, Wei, Yao, and Song all opened their offices in heaven. Why don't you just leave the heavenly palace and come down to the earth? How can you bear to see the suffering of the people?

poem:
列鼎佩金章，淚眼看風枝。
却思食藜藿，身作屠沽兒。
負米無遠近，所希升斗歸。
爲人無貴賤，莫學雞狗肥。
斯言如不忘，別更無光輝。
斯言如或忘，即安用人爲。
translate: Wearing golden badges and jeweled belts, we cry as we watch the wind sway the branches. Yet we think of the humble vegetables we eat, becoming butchers and brewers in life. Carrying rice, whether near or far, our hope is to bring home a measly amount. We are all equal, regardless of status, don't strive to be like chickens and dogs. If we remember this principle, our lives will shine brighter. If we forget it, what use are we?

poem:
父不父，兄不兄。
上留田，蝥賊生。
徒陟岡，淚崢嶸。
我欲使諸凡鳥雀，盡變爲鶺鴒。
我欲使諸凡草木，盡變爲田荆。
鄰人歌，鄰人歌。
古風清，清風生。
translate: Fatherless father, brotherless brother. Above the fields, the caterpillars breed. Hiking alone on the hills, tears flow profusely. I wish to transform all birds and crickets into waders. I wish to transform all plants and trees into field thorns. Neighbors sing, neighbors sing. Ancient winds are clear, clear winds blow.

poem:
霍嫖姚，趙充國，天子將之平朔漠。
肉胡之肉，燼胡帳幄。
千里萬里，唯留胡之空殼。
邊風蕭蕭，榆葉初落。
殺氣晝赤，枯骨夜哭。
將軍既立殊勳，遂有胡無人曲。
我聞之，天子富有四海。
德被無垠，但令一物得所。
八表來賓，亦何必令彼胡無人。
translate: Huo Piaoyao, Zhao Chongguo, the emperor sends them to subdue the northern desert. Devour the meat of the barbarians, burn their tents. A thousand miles and more, leaving only empty shells of the barbarians. The border wind howls, the elm leaves just beginning to fall. The killing atmosphere is red during the day, and the bones of the dead cry at night. After the general achieves outstanding achievements, there is a song about the barbarians disappearing. I hear that the emperor possesses the four seas. His virtue spreads endlessly, so long as one thing finds its place. All nations come as guests, why should we make the barbarians disappear?

poem:
北風北風，職何嚴毒。
摧壯士心，縮金烏足。
凍雲囂囂，礙雪一片下不得。
聲遶枯桑，根在沙塞。
黃河徹底，頑直到海。
一氣摶束，萬物無態。
唯有吾庭前杉松樹枝，枝枝健在。
translate: Northern Wind, northern wind, why are you so severe? Crushing the hearts of strong men, shrinking the golden birds' feet. Frozen clouds roar, hindering a single snowflake from falling. The sound surrounds withered saplings, their roots in the desert. The Yellow River flows all the way to the sea, stubborn and unyielding. A breath tightly binds everything, creating no change in all things. Only my courtyard's pine and cedar branches remain healthy, intact.

poem:
兔不遲，烏更急，但恐穆王八駿，著鞭不及。
所以蒿里，墳出蕺蕺。
氣凌雲天，龍騰鳳集。
盡爲風消土喫，狐掇蟻拾，黃金不啼玉不泣。
白楊騷屑，亂風愁月。
折碑石人，莽穢榛沒。
牛羊窸窣，時見牧童兒，弄枯骨。
translate: The rabbit does not delay, the crow is even more urgent, but fearing the eight steeds of King Mu, their reins cannot catch up. Therefore, in the wild garlic field, the graves emerge with a rustling sound. The air surpasses the clouds, as the dragon soars and the phoenix gathers. All are consumed by the wind and soil, like the fox picking up and the ants collecting, without the gold crying or the jade weeping. The white poplars rustle, mixed with the wind and the sad moon. The broken stone tablets and statues are buried in the thick underbrush. The sheep and cattle creak, occasionally revealing the shepherd boy playing with the bones.

poem:
涼風吹遠念，使我升高臺。
寧知數片雲，不是舊山來。
故人天一涯，久客殊未回。
鴈來不得書，空寄聲哀哀。
translate: The cool breeze blows my thoughts away, making me ascend the high terrace. I do not know if those few clouds are from the old mountains. My friends are far away, and it has been a long time since they have returned. The wild geese cannot bring a letter, only sending a sad sound.

poem:
秦之無道兮四海枯，築長城兮遮北胡。
築人築土一萬里，杞梁貞婦啼嗚嗚。
上無父兮中無夫，下無子兮孤復孤。
一號城崩塞色苦，再號杞梁骨出土。
疲魂飢魄相逐歸，陌上少年莫相非。
translate: The Qin Dynasty's tyranny has caused the land to wither, building the Great Wall to block the northern barbarians. A thousand miles of construction, the grieving widow weeps. In life, there was no father or husband, and in death, no children. As the wall collapses, the pain is great, and again, the bones of Jila are unearthed. Tired spirits and hungry souls return home, and young people on the road should not blame each other.

poem:
離恨如旨酒，古今飲皆醉。
只恐長江水，盡是兒女淚。
伊余非此輩，送人空把臂。
他日再相逢，清風動天地。
translate: The hatred of separation is like fine wine, making both past and present drinkers intoxicated. I fear that the long river water is filled with the tears of children and daughters. I am not of this group, so I can only offer empty gestures when sending someone off. When we meet again in the future, the breeze will move across the heavens and the earth.

poem:
萬里桑乾傍，茫茫古蕃壤。
將軍貌憔悴，撫劍悲年長。
胡兵尚陵逼，久住亦非強。
邯鄲少年輩，箇箇有伎倆。
拖槍半夜去，雪片大如掌。
translate: Along the vast Sanqian River, ancient frontier lands are vast and boundless. The general's face is haggard, holding his sword and sighing at his advancing years. The barbarian troops still threaten, and it is not strong to stay for a long time. Young people in Handan are full of skills and abilities. They drag their guns halfway through the night, and the snowflakes are as large as hands.

poem:
磧中有陰兵，戰馬時驚蹶。
輕猛李陵心，摧殘蘇武節。
黃金鎖子甲，風吹色如鐵。
十載不封侯，茫茫向誰說。
translate: In the sands, there are shadowy soldiers, and their horses are startled often. Li Ling's heart is light and fierce, destroying Su Wu's integrity. His golden scale armor, blown by the wind, looks like iron. After ten years, he hasn't achieved nobility, who can he speak to in vain?

poem:
錦衣鮮華手擎鶻，閑行氣貌多輕忽。
稼穡艱難總不知，五帝三王是何物。
translate: The elegant and splendid robe, held by the hand, displays the beauty of the hawk. The leisurely walk reveals a carefree air and appearance. The hardships of farming are always unknown to them; what are the Five Emperors and the Three Kings anyway?

poem:
自拳五色裘，迸入他人宅。
却捉蒼頭奴，玉鞭打一百。
translate: Fistful of five-colored robe, bursting into someone else's home. Capturing the old servant with a jade whip, beating 100 times.

poem:
面白如削玉，猖狂曲江曲。
馬上黃金鞍，適來新賭得。
translate: Her face is as pale as carved jade, galloping through the winding Qu Jiang River. Upon her horse, a golden saddle, just won in a new game.

poem:
夢到海中山，入箇白銀宅。
逢見一道士，稱是李八伯。
translate: In a dream, I ascended the mountains of the sea and entered a white silver mansion. There, I met a Taoist who claimed to be Li Eight Uncle.

poem:
三四仙女兒，身著瑟瑟衣。
手把明月珠，打落金色梨。
translate: Three or four fairy children, dressed in jade-like garments. Holding moon pearls and knocking down golden pears.

poem:
車渠地無塵，行至瑤池濱。
森森椿樹下，白龍來嗅人。
translate: The dustless chariot rushes to the edge of the Jade Pool. Beneath the dense camellia trees, the white dragon comes to sniff at people.

poem:
宮殿崢嶸籠紫氣，金渠玉砂五色水。
守閽仙婢相倚睡，偷摘蟠桃幾倒地。
translate: The majestic palace is shrouded in purple air, with golden canals and jade sand flowing as five-colored water. The fairy gatekeepers lean on each other to sleep, stealing peaches that nearly topple them.

poem:
繡林錦野，春態相壓。
誰家少年，馬蹄蹋蹋。
鬬雞走狗夜不歸，一擲賭却如花妾。
誰云不顛不狂，其名不彰。
悲夫！。
translate: Mosaic forests and brocaded fields, spring scenes compete. Whose young man, horse hooves drum. Fighting cock and running dogs stay out all night, a gamble for a flower-like concubine. Who says they are not dizzy or crazy, their fame is not prominent. Alas!

poem:
木落蕭蕭，蟲鳴唧唧。
不覺朱蔫臉紅，霜劫鬢漆。
世途多事，泣向秋日。
方今少壯不努力，老大徒傷悲。
translate: The wood falls quietly, the insects chirp noisily. Unaware of her reddening cheeks and frost-bitten hair, she weeps in the autumn breeze. In this world full of troubles, she cries to the setting sun. Now is the time to strive for success; otherwise, when old, one will only lament in vain.

poem:
憧憧合合，八表一轍。
黃塵霧合，車馬火熱。
名湯風雨，利輾霜雪。
千車萬馱，半宿關月。
上有堯禹，下有夔卨。
紫氣銀輪兮，常覆金闕。
仙掌捧日兮，濁河澄澈。
愚將草木兮有言，與華封人兮不別。
translate: Vague and vague, eight directions are one path. Yellow dust and mist combine, carriages and horses are fiery. Famous springs and wind and rain, advantageous to grind frost and snow. A thousand cars and ten thousand asses, half a night of moonlight at the pass. Above are Yao and Yu, below are Kui and Xie. Purple air and silver wheel, always covering the golden gate. Immortal palms hold the sun, muddy river becomes clear. I, a foolish grass and wood, have something to say, different from the people of Huafeng.

poem:
昔時昔時洛城人，今作茫茫洛城塵。
我聞富有石季倫，樓臺五色干星辰。
樂如天樂日夜聞，錦姝繡妾何紛紛。
真珠簾中，姑射神人。
文金線玉，香成暮雲。
孫秀若不殺，晉室應更貧。
伊水削行路，塚石花磷磷。
蒼茫金谷園，牛羊齕荆榛。
飛鳥好羽毛，疑是綠珠身。
translate: In the past, the people of Luoyang were once alive; now they are buried in the vast dust of Luoyang. I heard that Shi Jilon was rich, with multicolored towers and pavilions reaching for the stars. His joy was like the heavenly music heard day and night, and his beautiful concubines were adorned in silk and brocade. In the pearl curtain, there is the goddess Guya. Golden and jade ornaments, fragrant as the evening clouds. If Sun Shu had not been killed, the Jin state would have been even poorer. The road is cut by the Yin River, and the tombstones are decorated with flowers. The vast Golden Valley garden is filled with cattle and sheep feeding on brambles. The birds have beautiful feathers, suspected to be those of Lucretia.

poem:
有金張族，驕奢相續。
瓊樹玉堂，雕墻繡轂。
紈綺雜雜，鐘鼓合合。
美人如白牡丹花，半日只舞得一曲。
樂不樂，足不足，爭教他愛山青水綠。
translate: There is the golden Zhang clan, proud and extravagant. Jade trees and jade halls, carved walls and embroidered wheels. Silk and satin mixed together, bells and drums in harmony. Beautiful women like white peonies, dancing only one dance in half a day. Joy or sorrow, enough or not enough, who can teach them to love the green mountains and clear waters?

poem:
如神若仙，似蘭同雪。
樂戒于極，胡不知輟。
只欲更綴上落花，恨不能把住明月。
太山肉盡，東海酒竭。
佳人醉唱，敲玉釵折。
寧知耘田車水翁，日日日灸背欲裂。
translate: Like a god or an immortal, like orchid and snow. Enjoying to the extreme, why don't you know to stop? Just wanting to tie up the fallen flowers, regret not being able to grasp the bright moon. The mountains are devoured, the East Sea wine is exhausted. Beautiful women sing drunk, knocking their jade hairpins broken. How could they know the farmer tilling the fields and drawing water, every day with a sunburned back that feels like it's about to split?

poem:
高樹風多，吹爾巢落。
深蒿葉暖，宜爾依泊。
莫近鴞類，蛛網亦惡。
飲野田之清水，食野田之黃粟。
深花中睡，𡋯土裏浴。
如此即全勝啄太倉之穀，而更穿人之屋。
translate: The wind blows strongly in the tall trees, causing your nest to fall. The deep weeds and warm leaves provide a suitable place for you to rest. Do not approach owls or spiderwebs, as they are unpleasant. Drink the clear water from the fields and eat the yellow millet. Sleep among the deep flowers and bathe in the soil. This is far superior to pecking at stored grain, and also involves penetrating human homes.

poem:
一雨火雲盡，閉門心冥冥。
蘭花與芙蓉，滿院同芳馨。
佳人天一涯，好鳥何嚶嚶。
我有雙白璧，不羨于虞卿。
我有徑寸珠，別是天地精。
玩之室生白，瀟灑身安輕。
只應天上人，見我雙眼明。
translate: After the rain, the fire clouds dissipate; closing the door, my heart is in trance. Orchids and hibiscus, fragrant through the whole courtyard. The beautiful lady is far away, the lovely birds are singing. I have two white jades, I don't envy Yu Yu. I have a grain of pearl, it's the essence of heaven and earth. Playing with it, the room turns white, and I feel light and free. Only those in heaven can see my bright eyes.

poem:
陽烏爍萬物，草木懷春恩。
茫茫塵土飛，培壅名利根。
我本是蓑笠，幼知天子尊。
學爲毛氏詩，亦多直致言。
不慕需臑類，附勢同崩奔。
唯尋桃李蹊，去去長者門。
translate: The sun's warmth shines on all things, and plants and trees embrace the spring. Vast dust flies, nourishing the roots of fame and wealth. I am but a simple farmer, yet I know the dignity of the emperor. Learning from Mencius' poetry, I also speak candidly. Not seeking to be like others, I follow the path of the collapsing and run. Only seeking the paths of peach and plum trees, I depart from the doors of the elders.

poem:
美人如遊龍，被服金鴛鴦。
手把古刀尺，在彼白玉堂。
文章深掣曳，珂珮鳴丁當。
好風吹桃花，片片落銀床。
何妨學羽翰，遠逐朱鳥翔。
translate: The beautiful lady is like a wandering dragon, dressed in golden mandarin ducks. Holding an ancient dagger and measuring tape, she stands in the white jade hall. Her words are deep and resonant, with jingling bells and ornaments. The gentle breeze blows through the peach blossoms, leaving petals on the silver bed. Why not learn to soar like a bird, following the red bird in its flight?

poem:
乾坤有清氣，散入詩人脾。
聖賢遺清風，不在惡木枝。
千人萬人中，一人兩人知。
憶在東溪日，花開葉落時。
幾擬以黃金，鑄作鍾子期。
translate: The poetic spirit of the universe permeates the poet's soul. The legacy of sages and heroes can be found in the pure breeze, not in the evil branches. Among a thousand people, only one or two know their worth. Recalling those days by the east stream, flowers bloomed and leaves fell. I almost used gold to mold a Zhong Ziqi for you.

poem:
莫輕白雲白，不與風雨會。
莫見守羊兒，或是初平輩。
人生非日月，光輝豈常在。
一榮與一辱，古今常相對。
君不見于公門，子孫好冠蓋。
translate: Do not despise the white clouds, they do not meet with wind and rain. Do not see the shepherd's child, or perhaps the beginning level. Life is not like the sun and moon, its brightness is not always present. One glory and one humiliation, ancient and modern are often in opposition. You do not see in the public gate, the descendants enjoy a fine reputation.

poem:
古交如真金，百煉色不回。
今交如暴流，儵忽生塵埃。
我願君子氣，散爲青松栽。
我恐荆棘花，只爲小人開。
傷心復傷心，吟上高高臺。
translate: The ancient friendship is as pure as gold, refined through a hundred trials and unchanged. The present friendship is like a sudden flood, quickly creating dust and debris. I wish the noble spirit to spread and become young pines. I fear the thorny flowers only bloom for petty people. Heartbroken again and again, I sing on the high platform.

poem:
常思謝康樂，文章有神力。
是何清風清，凜然似相識。
一種爲頑嚚，得作翻經石。
一種爲枯槁，得作登山屐。
永嘉爲郡後，山水添鮮碧。
何當學羽翰，一去觀遺跡。
translate: Often think of Xie Kang's happiness, his articles have divine power. What a clear breeze, so cool and familiar. One becomes a stubborn stone, used for turning sutras. The other becomes a pair of worn-out shoes, used for climbing mountains. After Yaocheng became the governor, the landscape became fresher and greener. When will I learn to soar like a bird, and visit the remnants of the past?

poem:
常思李太白，仙筆驅造化。
玄宗致之七寶床，虎殿龍樓無不可。
一朝力士脫靴後，玉上青蠅生一箇。
紫皇殿前五色麟，忽然掣斷黃金鎖。
五湖大浪如銀山，滿船載酒撾鼓過。
賀老成異物，顛狂誰敢和。
寧知江邊墳，不是猶醉臥。
translate: Often I think of Li Taige, a celestial pen driving creation. The Emperor Xuanzong placed him on a jade bed, fitting for a deity in the Dragon Palace. After Yang Gao pulled off his boots, a fly landed on the jade. Five colorful dragons appeared in the Emperor's palace, suddenly breaking the golden chain. The five lakes roared like silver mountains, filled with wine and drums as they passed by. Lao He became an oddity, who would dare to dance madly with him? Little did they know that the riverbank tomb was not where he still lay drunk.

poem:
憶在山中時，丹桂花葳蕤。
紅泉浸瑤草，白日生華滋。
箬屋開地鑪，翠墻挂藤衣。
看經竹窗邊，白猨三兩枝。
東峰有老人，眼碧頭骨奇。
種薤煮白石，旨趣如嬰兒。
月上來打門，月落方始歸。
授我微妙訣，恬澹無所爲。
別來六七年，只恐白日飛。
translate: Remembering My Time in the Mountains, the Red Flower Blooms. The Red Spring Waters Wet the Jade Grass, and the Bright Day Gives Birth to Luxuriant Flowers. The Bamboo Hut Opens to the Earth Furnace, with Green Walls Hanging on Wisteria Garments. Reading Scriptures by the Bamboo Window, Two or Three White Monkeys Gather. There is an Old Man on the Eastern Peak, with Blue Eyes and a Strange, Bone-like Appearance. He Plants Leeks and Boils White Stones, Enjoying the Taste of Infants. The Moon Rises to Knock on the Door, and It Is Only Then That He Returns. He Teaches Me Profound Secrets, Making Me Calm and Indifferent. Six or Seven Years Have Passed Since We Parted, Fearing That the Days Will Fly Away.

poem:
霰雨灂灂，風號如斸。
有叟有叟，暮投我宿。
吁歎自語，云太守酷。
如何如何，掠脂斡肉。
吳姬唱一曲，等閑破紅束。
韓娥唱一曲，錦段鮮照屋。
寧知一曲兩曲謌，曾使千人萬人哭。
不惟哭，亦白其頭，飢其族，所以祥風不來，和氣不復。
蝗乎蠈忽，東西南北。
translate: Drizzling snow and rain, the wind howls like a scythe. An old man, an old man, comes to me in the evening. He sighs and whispers, "The governor is cruel, oh so cruel. How can this be? Looting and devouring the people's wealth. A song from a Wu princess, casually breaking the red ribbon. A song from Han Yo, her silk garments shining brightly in the house. Who knew that one or two songs could make a thousand or ten thousand people cry? Not only crying, but also making their heads bald and starving their families. Therefore, the auspicious wind does not come, and the harmonious atmosphere is no longer there. Like locusts and caterpillars, they wander east, west, south, and north.

poem:
厚於鐵圍山上鐵，薄似雙成仙體纈。
蜀機鳳雛動蹩躠，珊瑚枝枝撐著月。
王愷家中藏難掘，顏回飢僝愁天雪。
古松直筆雷不折，雪衣女啄蟠桃缺。
translate: Thick as iron on the Iron Hill, thin like the silk clothes of the twin immortals. The phoenix chicks of Shu move awkwardly, and the coral branches support the moon. It's hard to dig up the treasures in Wang Kai's home, and Yan Hui is hungry and worried about the snowy sky. The ancient pine bends like a lightning rod, and the snow-clad girl pecks at the missing peach.

poem:
緬想當時宮闕盛，荒宴椒房懱堯聖。
玉樹花歌百花裏，珊瑚窗中海日迸。
大臣來朝酒未醒，酒醒忠諫多不聽。
陳宮因此成野田，耕人犂破宮人鏡。
translate: Recalling the grand palace in its heyday, the wasteful feast in the pepper room belittles Emperor Yao. Within the jade tree and flower songs bloom within a hundred flowers, while the sea of sunlight bursts through the coral windows. The grand officials come to court, their drinks still not sober; once sober, their loyal advice is often ignored. The old palace becomes farmland, with plowmen breaking the palace ladies' mirrors.

poem:
靜只焚香坐，詠懷悲歲闌。
佳人忽有贈，滿手紅琅玕。
不獨耀肌魄，將行爲羽翰。
酬如上青天，風雪空漫漫。
translate: Sitting quietly incense burning, I lament the passing of time. Suddenly, a beautiful woman offers her hand, filled with red jade. Not only shining through her skin, it will also serve as a feathery fan. In return, she ascends into the sky, amidst the empty vastness of wind and snow.

poem:
美如仙鼎金，清如纖手琴。
孫登嘯一聲，縹緲不可尋。
但覺神洋洋，如入三昧林。
釋手復在手，古意深復深。
慚無英瓊瑤，何以酬知音。
translate: Beautiful as a celestial urn made of gold, clear as a delicate hand playing a zither. With a howl from Sun Deng, it vanishes into the ethereal realm. One feels a spiritual uplift, entering the realm of trance. Releasing and then grasping again, the ancient meaning deepens with each touch. Ashamed that I have no gems to offer, what can I repay for this true friendship?

poem:
茫茫凶荒，迥如天設。
駐馬四顧，氣候迂結。
秋空崢嶸，黃日將沒。
多少行人，白日見物。
莫道路高低，盡是戰骨。
莫見地赤碧，盡是征血。
昔人昔人既能忠盡于力，身糜戈戟。
脂其風，膏其域。
今人何不繩其塍？
植其食。
而使空曠年年，常貯愁煙。
使我至此，不能無言。
translate: Vast and desolate, as if heavenly designed. Gazing around, the climate is twisted and convoluted. The autumn sky looms large, the yellow sun is about to set. Countless travelers, seeing things in broad daylight. Do not speak of high and low roads, they are all the bones of battles. Do not see the red and green earth, they are all the blood of wars. In the past, people could be loyal and give their all, sacrificing their lives on the battlefield. They fed the wind and nourished the land. Why don't today's people follow their path? Plant their food. Let the emptiness and loneliness accumulate yearly, always filled with melancholy smoke. Bringing me here, I cannot help but speak.

poem:
獵師紛紛走榛莽，女亦相隨把弓矢。
南北東西盡殺心，斷燒殘雲在圍裏。
鶻拂荒田兔成血，竿打黃茅雉驚起。
傷嗟箇輩亦是人，一生將此關身己。
我聞天地之大德曰生，又聞萬事皆天意。
何遣此人又如此，猶更願天公一丈雪，深山麋鹿盡凍死。
translate: Hunters rush through the undergrowth, women follow with their bows and arrows. They kill with a vengeance in all directions, setting fire to the remnants of clouds within the encirclement. Hawks sweep across the wasteland, leaving rabbits bloodstained, while reeds strike yellow reeds, causing birds to startle into flight. Alas, these people are also human beings, spending their lives using this for their own benefit. I have heard that the great virtue of the universe is life, and I have heard that everything is predestined by heaven. Why should this person be treated like this? I still wish the heavenly father a foot of snow, so that all the deer and elk in the deep mountains can freeze to death.

poem:
赤蘆蓋屋低壓恰，沙漲柴門水痕疊。
黃雞青犬花蒙籠，漁女漁兒掃風葉。
有叟相逢帶秋醉，自拔船樁色無媿。
前山脚下得魚多，惡浪堆中盡頭睡。
但得忘筌心自樂，肯羨前賢釣清渭。
終須畫取挂秋堂，與爾爲鄰有深意。
translate: Red reeds cover the low-lying hut, sand rises to the doorpost with water marks stacked. Yellow chickens and blue dogs wander among the flowers, fishing girls and boys sweep the wind-swept leaves. An old man meets a fellow drunkard, pulling out the boat's anchor without shame. Fish are caught below the front mountains, sleeping at the end of the rough waves. Contentment comes from forgetting the fishing net, not envying the past heroes fishing in the clear Wei River. Eventually, the catch will be painted and hung in the autumn room, becoming neighbors with deep meaning.

poem:
田家老翁無可作，晝甑蒸梨香漠漠。
只向堦前曝背眠，赤桑大葉時時落。
古壍侵門桃竹密，倉囤峨峨欲遮日。
自云孫子解耕耘，四五年來腹多實。
我聞此語心自悲，世上悠悠豈得知，稼而不穡徒爾爲。
translate: The old farmer has nothing to do, steaming pears during the day, their fragrance filling the air. He lies on his back in front of the steps, as the red silk cotton leaves fall one by one. The ancient ditch, with peach and bamboo trees close to the door, and the granary tall and imposing, blocking the sun. He claims that his grandson is skilled at farming, and in the past four or five years, his belly has been full. Hearing this, I feel sad, for in this world, there are so many who do not understand the importance of agriculture and harvesting.

poem:
松森森，江渾渾，江邊古祠空閉門。
精靈應醉社日酒，白龜咬斷菖蒲根。
花殘泠紅宿雨滴，土龍甲濕鬼眼赤。
天符早晚下空碧，昨夜前村行霹靂。
translate: Misty pines, muddy river, an ancient shrine by the river stands empty. Spirits should be drunk in celebration of the harvest, as a white tortoise gnaws at the sweet flag's roots. Fragrant flowers wither with cool red rain dripping, and the earth dragon's scales are wet, revealing red eyes. The heavens' divine decree will soon descend into the azure sky, as last night thunderbolts struck the village ahead.

poem:
天雲如燒人如炙，天地鑪中更合適。
蟬喘雷乾冰井融，些子清風有何益。
守羊真人聃之役，高吟招隱倚碧壁。
紫氣紅煙鮮的的，澗茗園瓜麴塵色，驕冷奢涼合相憶。
translate: The sky and clouds burn like a fire, and people are roasted; in the furnace of heaven and earth, it's even more suitable. The cicadas gasp for breath as the thunder dries up the ice wells, but what good is a bit of fresh air? The guardian of the sheep, true immortal Dong, recites his verses, leaning against the green walls to recruit retreat. The purple air and red smoke are bright, and the stream tea, garden melon, and kuo-chen colors blend together. In memory, pride, coldness, and luxury combine with coolness.

poem:
新詩一千首，古錦初下機。
除月與鬼神，別未有人知。
子期去不返，浩浩良不悲。
不知天地間，知者復是誰。
translate: One thousand new poems, ancient brocade just off the loom. Except for the moon and ghosts, no one else knows it yet. Ziqi has left and never returned, the vastness is not sad. Who among the heaven and earth knows, who else can understand?

poem:
門前數枝路，路路車馬鳴。
名埃與利塵，千里萬里行。
只見青山高，豈見青山平。
朱門勢峨峨，冠蓋何光明。
黃鳥在花裏，青蟬奪其聲。
爾生非金玉，豈常貴復貞。
寄言之子心，可以歸無形。
translate: In front of the gate, several branches of the road, all filled with the sound of horses and carriages. Famous dust and profit-seeking dust, traveling thousands of miles. Only seeing the green hills high, not seeing them flat. The red gates are majestic, the crowns and covers shine brightly. The yellow birds sing in the flowers, while the green cicadas compete for their voices. Your life is not made of jade and gold, can it be always precious and true? Send a message to your heart, you can return to nothingness.

poem:
蟪蛄切切風騷騷，芙蓉噴香蟾蜍高。
孤燈耿耿征婦勞，更深撲落金錯刀。
translate: The cicadas chirp and the wind rustles, the hibiscus blooms and the toads are high. The solitary lamp glows, the soldiers' wives work hard, as the night deepens, the golden dagger falls.

poem:
柴門寂寂黍飯馨，山家煙火春雨晴。
庭花濛濛水泠泠，小兒啼索樹上鶯。
translate: Quietly burning rice in the thatched door, spring rain clears on a mountain home. Mists cover the courtyard flowers and water flows gently, children cry for the birds singing in the trees.

poem:
水香塘黑蒲森森，鴛鴦鸂鶒如家禽。
前村後壟桑柘深，東鄰西舍無相侵。
蠶娘洗繭前溪淥，牧童吹笛和衣浴。
山翁留我宿又宿，笑指西坡瓜豆熟。
translate: The water-fragrant pond with black reeds stands tall, like a flock of wild ducks. In the front and back villages, mulberry trees and orange trees grow deep, with no invasion from neighbors east or west. The silk moth women wash their cocoons in the clear stream, while shepherds play their flutes and bathe in the water. The mountain hermit invites me to stay again, pointing at the ripe melons and beans on the western slope with a smile.

poem:
春霖閉門久，春色聚庭木。
一夢辭舊山，四鄰有新哭。
菰蒲生白水，風篁擢纖玉。
爲憶湖上翁，花時獨冥目。
translate: Spring rain closes the door for a long time, as spring scenery gathers in the courtyard trees. Leaving the old mountain in a dream, neighbors hear new cries. Bamboo reeds grow in the white water, and the wind whispers through the slender jade stalks. I think of the old man by the lake, who closes his eyes alone during the flower season.

poem:
嘮嘮長夜坐，嘮嘮早起。
杉森森，不見長，人聲續續如流水。
摐金掙玉，吐宮嚥徵。
頭低草木，手合神鬼。
日消三兩黃金爭得止，而槁木朽枝，一食而已。
傷嗟浮世之人，善事不曾入耳。
translate: Sitting through a long, long night, getting up early in the morning. Cypress trees stand tall, yet they're not so long; human voices continue like a flowing stream. Striking gold and jade, exhaling the palace and swallowing the major third. Bending low to the grass and trees, hands joined with gods and spirits. Spending a few yellowing days in pursuit of gold, but eventually, withered wood and rotting branches, just one meal is enough. Sad for those in the fleeting world, good deeds never enter their ears.

poem:
茫茫復茫茫，滿眼皆埃塵。
莫言白髮多，莖莖是愁筋。
未達苦雕僞，及達多不仁。
淺深與高低，盡能生棘榛，茫茫四大愁殺人。
translate: Vastness upon vastness, my eyes are filled with dust. Do not say that the white hair is much, each strand is a thread of sorrow. Before reaching the bitter carving fraud, and after reaching, many are unkind. Shallow and deep, high and low, can all create thorns and bushes. The vastness of the four great causes pain in people.

poem:
至寶不自寶，照古還照今。
仙人手胼胝，寥泬秋沈沈。
不是十二面，不是百煉金。
若非八彩眉，不可輒照臨。
即歸玉案頭，爲君整冠簪。
即居吾君手，照出天下心。
恭聞太宗朝，此鏡當宸襟。
六合懸清光，萬里無塵侵。
此鏡今又出，天地還得一。
translate: The precious mirror shines both in the past and the present. It is crafted by a celestial hand, with a quiet and deep autumn atmosphere. It is not made of twelve faces or 100-fold refined gold. Without its eight-colored eyebrows, it cannot be used easily. It returns to its place on the jade tabletop, ready to help you arrange your hairpins. In the hands of our ruler, it reflects the hearts of all people. I hear that in the Emperor Taizong's reign, this mirror was placed in the imperial chamber. The bright light shines over the six realms, keeping dust from invading for thousands of miles. Now that this mirror has reappeared, the world is once again whole.

poem:
松品落落，雪格索索。
眼有三角，頭峭五岳。
若不居岳，此處難著。
藥僮貌蠻名鄙彼，葫蘆酒滿擔劣起。
萬里長風嘯一聲，九貞須拍黃金几。
落葉蕭蕭□杳□，送師言了意未了。
意未了，他時爲我致取一部音聲鳥。
translate: Pines are scattered, snowflakes are drifting. Eyes have triangular shapes, heads rise to the five mountains. If you don't live in the mountains, it's hard to stay here. The drug boy looks rude and his name is derogatory. Gourd wine is full of bad trips. A long wind blows for ten thousand miles, and Nine Zhen must pat the golden throne. Leaves fall and sound disappears. When I send off the teacher, my intentions are not clear. My intentions are not clear, please bring me a collection of bird songs at some other time.

poem:
海中紫霧蓬萊島，安期子喬去何早。
遊戲多騎白騏驎，鬚髮如銀未曾老。
亦留仙訣在人間，齧鏃終言藥非道。
始皇不得此深旨，遠遣徐福生憂惱。
紫朮黃精心上苗，大還小還行中寶。
若師方術棄心師，浪似雪山何處討。
translate: The sea is shrouded in purple mist, the Penglai Island where Anqi Zi has long since departed. He rode a white chimerain to play and his hair and beard were like silver, never showing signs of aging. He left divine secrets for mankind, but believed medicine was not the way. Emperor Qin Shi Huang did not understand these profound meanings, sending Xu Fu away in distress. The purple and yellow herbs are the essence of life, the elixir of life is a treasure. If one abandons their heart for knowledge and pursues only techniques, where will they find their answers like the endless snowy mountains?

poem:
需宿需宿，炳爛光合。
蒸蒸婺民，鍾此多福。
自東自西，自南自北。
伊飛伊走，乳乳良牧。
和氣無形，春光自成。
大信不信，貽厥無朕。
需女需女，爾亦須語。
使君爲理，玄風震古。
需女需女，爾亦須語。
我願喙長三千里，枕著玉階奏明主。
translate:
Necessity, necessity, bright and resplendent, 
Burning brightly, united in harmony. 
Thriving people, blessed with abundance, 
From east to west, from south to north. 
They fly and walk, like nurturing shepherds, 
With invisible harmony, spring's glory unfolds. 
Great faith unbelieved, no trace remains, 
Necessity, necessity, you must speak your mind. 
Leaders govern wisely, ancient virtues revive, 
Necessity, necessity, you must speak your mind. 
I wish my beak were three thousand miles long, 
Lying on the jade steps, I would sing for the wise ruler.

poem:
我有一面鏡，新磨似秋月。
上唯金膏香，下狀驪龍窟。
等閑不欲開，醜者多不悅。
或問幾千年，軒轅手中物。
translate: I have a mirror, freshly polished like the autumn moon. Above it is the fragrance of golden essence, below it resembles the lair of the black dragon. Carefully, one does not want to open it, for those who are ugly often do not enjoy it. Sometimes asked how many centuries, it was created in the hands of the ancient emperor.

poem:
張周二夫子，詩好人太癖。
更不過嶺來，如今頭盡白。
人傳禹力不到處，河聲流向西。
又到處即閉戶，逢君方展眉。
不知是不是，若是即大奇。
我又聞二公，心與人不同。
一生常在寂寞中，有時狂吟入僧宅。
錦囊鳥啼荔枝紅，有時冥搜海山腦。
珊瑚枝動日杲杲，聖君在上知不知，赤面濁醪許多好。
translate: Zhang and Tue, the two scholars, are known for their poetic talents and eccentricities. They have not crossed the mountains, and now their hair has turned completely white. It is said that the Great Flood did not reach this area, and the river's sound flows westward. When they arrive at a place, they close the door, and when they meet you, they smile. I am not sure if it is true, but if it is, it is truly amazing. I have also heard that both of them have different minds from others. They spend their lives in solitude, sometimes wildly reciting poetry in a monk's residence. The golden oriole sings among the red lichee fruits, and sometimes they search for inspiration in the sea and mountains. The coral branches sway in the sunlight, and the benevolent emperor knows it all, enjoying the red-faced muddy wine with many people.

poem:
儀清態淡雕瓊瓌，捲簾瀟灑無塵埃。
嶽茶如乳庭花開，信心弟子時時來。
灌頂壇嚴伸㽬塞，三十年功苦拘束。
梵僧夢裏授微言，雪嶺白牛力深得。
水精一索香一爐，紅蓮花舌生醍醐。
初聽喉音寶樓閣，如聞魔王宮殿拉金瓦落。
次聽妙音大隨求，更覺人間萬事深悠悠。
四音俱作清且柔，愛河濁浪却倒流。
却倒流兮無處去，碧海含空日初曙。
translate: The refined and delicate appearance of the statue is carved with jade ornaments, rolling up the curtain gently without dust. The mountains and tea gardens are like milk, and the faithful disciples come and go. The consecration altar is solemn and well-sealed, with thirty years of hard work and restraint. The Hindu monk dreams of receiving subtle teachings, and the white bull on the snowy peak exerts its strength. A crystal incense burner and an aromatic furnace, red lotus tongue producing nectar. Initially hearing the sound of the precious tower, it seems as if the devil's palace is pulling down the golden tiles. Then hearing the wonderful sound of the Great Attainment, one feels that all human matters are deeply profound. All four sounds are clear and soft, and the muddy waves of the love river flow backward. Retreating and flowing nowhere, the vast ocean contains the empty sky at daybreak.

poem:
青松雖有花，有花不如無。
貧井泉雖清，且無金轆轤。
客從遠方來，遺我古銅鏡。
挂之玉堂上，如對軒轅聖。
天龍睡坤腹，土蝕金鬣綠。
因知燕趙佳人顏似玉，不得此鏡終不。
translate: Although there are flowers on the green pines, it is better to have none. Although the well in the poor area has clear spring water, it has no golden pulley. The guest comes from afar, leaving me an ancient bronze mirror. Hanging it on the jade hall, as if facing the ancient sage. As the dragon sleeps in the earth's belly, the soil erodes the green mane of gold. Thus knowing that the beautiful people of Yan and Zhao have a face like jade, they will never have this mirror.

poem:
天驥頭似鳥，[倐]忽四天下。
南金色如椹，入火不見火。
吾交二名士，遽立于帝左。
鳳姿既出世，天意囑在我。
奇哉子淵頌，無可無不可。
translate: The sky's steed has a bird-like head, swiftly traversing the four directions. The southern goldenness is like a walnut, entering fire without seeing fire. I have befriended two famous scholars, quickly standing at the emperor's left. The phoenix's posture has appeared in the world, and Heaven's will is entrusted to me. Amazingly, Zi Yan's ode is both acceptable and unacceptable.

poem:
我有一端綺，花彩鸞鳳羣。
佳人金錯刀，何似裁此文。
translate: I have a beautiful robe, adorned with flowers and colorful phoenixes. A beautiful woman uses a golden scissors to cut the fabric, just like creating this poem.

poem:
我有白雲琴，樸斲天地精。
俚耳不使聞，慮同衆樂聽。
指指法仙法，聲聲聖人聲。
一彈四時和，再彈中古清。
庭前梧桐枝，颯颯南風生。
還希師曠懷，見我心不輕。
translate: I have the White Cloud Piano, crafted from the essence of heaven and earth. It is meant for solo playing, as it is not intended for public consumption. Each note is a magical touch, evoking the voices of saints. When played, it harmonizes with the four seasons, creating a serene atmosphere. The courtyards before me are filled with the sound of the Wutong tree, whispered by the south wind. I hope to be recognized by those in authority, as my heart is full of reverence.

poem:
周邵吁噓氣，結爲禎祥雲。
客從遠方來，持此將贈君。
時命偶不謬，授館終南東。
愔愔良吏師，不寐如老農。
丘軻文之天，代天有餘功。
代天復代天，后稷何所從。
translate: Zhou Shao sighs, forming a auspicious cloud. The guest comes from afar, bearing this to present to you. Fate occasionally does not err, granting an academy in the east of the Tao River. The quiet and capable officials are like old farmers who do not sleep. The culture of Confucius is heavenly, leaving behind abundant achievements. Replacing heaven and replacing heaven, what is Hou Ji following?

poem:
夜雨山草滋，爽籟生古木。
閑吟竹仙偈，清於嚼金玉。
蟋蟀啼壞牆，苟免悲局促。
道人優曇花，迢迢遠山綠。
translate: Night rain nourishes mountain grass, refreshing sounds arise from ancient trees. Leisurely reciting the verses of the bamboo immortal, it's as refreshing as chewing jade and gold. The cricket's song pierces the wall, escaping the confined sadness. The monk enjoys the Unexpected Flower, distant mountains are green and vast.

poem:
果熟無低枝，芳香入屏帷。
故人久不來，萱草何離離。
苦吟齋貌減，更被杉風吹。
獨賴湖上翁，時爲烹露葵。
translate: The fruit is ripe and hangs low, its fragrance filling the curtains. Long-time friends have not come, the daylilies are scattered apart. The austere study looks worse, further battered by the pine wind. I rely on the old man by the lake to cook up some morning dewdrops for me.

poem:
紅藕暎嘉魴，澄池照孤坐。
池痕放文彩，雨氣贈慵墮。
山翁寄朮藥，幸得秋病可。
終召十七人，雲中備香火。
translate: Red lotus reflects on the beautiful carp, the clear pond reflects my solitary seat. The pond's traces reveal its cultural essence, and the rain's breath bestows laziness upon me. The mountain hermit sends herbal medicine, thankfully treating my autumn ailments. I will eventually summon seventeen people, preparing incense and fire in the clouds.

poem:
清氣生滄洲，殘雲落林藪。
放鶴久不歸，不知更歸否。
支策到江湄，江臯木葉飛。
自憐爲客遠，還如鵲遶枝。
南枝復北枝，玉露沾毛衣。
translate: The clear air arises from the vast waters, the remaining clouds drift through the forests. The released cranes have been away for a long time, I do not know if they will return again. Propping myself up on a staff, I arrive at the river's edge; the river bank's leaves are flying about. I feel pity for being so far away from home, just like the magpie circling around branches. From the south branch to the north branch, the dewdrops wet their feathers.

poem:
錦袷胡兒黑如漆，騎羊上冰如箭疾。
蒲萄酒白雕腊紅，苜蓿根甜沙鼠出。
單于右臂何須斷，天子昭昭本如日。
一握黳髯一握絲，須知只爲平戎術。

去年轉鬬陰山脚，生得單于却放却。
今年深入于不毛，胡兵拔帳遺弓刀。
男兒須展平生志，爲國輸忠合天地。
甲穿雖即失黃金，劒缺猶能生紫氣。
塞草萋萋兵士苦，胡虜如今勿胡虜。
封侯十萬始無心，玉關凱入君看取。
translate: Last year, I fought at the foot of Yin Mountain; born a chieftain, I relinquished my title. This year, I ventured deep into the barren lands; the barbarian soldiers left their tents and weapons behind. As a man, you must fulfill your life's purpose; be loyal to your country and unite heaven and earth. Although your armor may have lost its gold, your sword still radiates purple energy. The grass on the frontier is overgrown, and the soldiers suffer; do not let the barbarians reign now. After achieving marquis status, one has no other desires; celebrate your victory at the Jade Pass, as I will watch from afar.

poem:
庭鳥多好音，相呼灌木中。
竹房更何有，還如鳥巢空。
賴逢富人侯，真東晉謝公。
煌煌發令姿，珂珮鳴丁冬。
故山有深霞，未如旌旗紅。
慚非衛霍松，何以當清風。
translate: The court birds make sweet sounds, calling to each other in the bushes. What more is there in the bamboo house, empty like a bird's nest? Fortunately, I meet wealthy lords, truly like Xie Gong of the Eastern Jin Dynasty. Brilliant and commanding appearance, jade ornaments ring like a bell. The deep red in the old mountain is not as beautiful as the red banners. Ashamed that I am not like Wei Hu's pine, how can I face the clear breeze?

poem:
露益蟬聲長，蕙蘭垂紫帶。
清吟代明月，孤雲忽爲蓋。
伊余石林人，本是燒畬輩。
頻接謝公棊，輸多未曾賽。
translate: The dew benefits the cicada's song, and the purple ribbon of orchids and lilies hangs down. The clear chant replaces the bright moon, and the solitary cloud suddenly becomes a canopy. I am from the Stone Forest region, originally a burner of wildlands. Frequently playing Go with Mr. Xie, I lose many games but never compete.

poem:
大道貴無心，聖賢爲始慕。
秋空共澄潔，美玉同貞素。
偉哉桐江守，雌黃出金口。
爲文能廢興，談道弭空有。
雪林槁枯者，坐石聽亦久。
還疑紫磨身，成居靈運後。
translate: The great path values sincerity, the sages are admired as role models. The autumn sky is clear and pure, like a beautiful jade with its purity. The magnificent Tung River guardian, with words that flow like gold. He can create and destroy literature, discussing philosophy to eliminate doubts. In the snow-covered woods, the withered trees have sat for a long time, listening attentively. One wonders if he has become a spiritual figure, following in Ling Yun's footsteps.

poem:
篔簹紅實好鳥語，銀髯瘦僧貌如祖。
香煙濛濛衣上聚，冥心縹緲入鐵圄。
白麏作夢枕藤屨，東峯山媼貢瓜乳。
translate: The bamboo's red fruit and the sweet birds' song, a thin monk with silver whiskers like an ancestor. The fragrant smoke gathers on his clothes, as his mind floats into the iron prison. A white deer dreams of using vines as a pillow, while the eastern peak's old woman offers melon milk

poem:
雪泥露金冰滴瓦，楓檉火著僧留坐。
忽覩逋翁一軸歌，始覺詩魔辜負我。
花飛飛，雪霏霏，三珠樹曉珠纍纍。
妖狐爬出西子骨，雷車拶破織女機。
憶昔鄱陽寺中見一碣，逋翁詞兮逋翁札。
庾翼未伏王右軍，李白不知誰擬殺。
別，別，若非仙眼應難別。
不可說，不可說，離亂亂離應打折。
translate: Dripping ice on the roof, snow mud reveals golden ice. Maple branches ablaze, monks remain seated by the fire. Suddenly I see an old man's song scroll, realizing the poet's magic has betrayed me. Flowers fly, snow falls, three pearls tree at dawn, its gems accumulate. The fox emerges from the bones of the western beauty, the thunder carriage breaks the weaving maiden's loom. Recalling a stele seen in the Poyang Temple, the old man's words and his calligraphy. Yu Yi does not submit to Wang Xianjun, Li Bai does not know who will be killed. Farewell, farewell, unless it's an immortal's eyes, it would be hard to tell apart. Unspeakable, unspeakable, in chaos and disarray, it should be cut short.

poem:
冬風吹草木，亦吹我病根。
故人久不來，冷落如丘園。
聃龍與摩詰，吁歎非不聞。
顧惟年少時，未合多憂懃。
風鍾遠孤枕，雪水流凍痕。
空餘微妙心，期空靜者論。
translate: The winter wind blows through the grass and trees, it also blows my ailing roots. The old friend has not come for a long time, the cold loneliness is like a barren field. Tan Dragon and Mohaji, their sighs are not heard. Looking back on my younger days, I did not deserve to worry so much. The wind chimes sound from a lonely pillow, the snowwater flows with frozen traces. Empty and subtle, I hope to discuss it with those who are calm in emptiness.

poem:
胸中有一物，旅拒復攻擊。
向下還上來，唯疑是肺石。
山童頑且小，用之復何益。
教洗煮茶鐺，雪團打鄰壁。
宛轉無好姿，裴回更何適。
庭前早梅樹，坐見花盡碧。
屋老多鼠窠，窗卑露山脊。
近來胸中物，已似輸藥力。
微吟復微今，依稀似莊舃。
translate: There is a thing in my chest, resisting and attacking. Down and up it goes, doubtfully a lung stone. The mountain child is stubborn and small, what use can he be? Teaching him to wash and cook the tea pot, hitting the neighboring wall with snow balls. Turning and twisting, there is no good posture; wandering, where can he go? In front of the courtyard, the plum tree, watching the flowers turn green. The house is old, with many mouse nests; the window is low, revealing the mountain ridge. Lately, the thing in my chest has begun to lose its strength. Softly reciting today, it seems like a dream.

poem:
文章擬真宰，儀冠冷如[璧]。
山寺偶相逢，眼青勝山色。
氣隆多慷慨，語澹無他力。
金繩殘果落，竹閣涼雨滴。
自媿龍鍾人，見此沖天翼。
translate: Articles are crafted by the true ruler, the ceremonial crown is cold as jade. We meet by chance in the mountain temple, your eyes are bluer than the mountains' hue. Your aura exudes great generosity, your words are simple yet powerful. The golden cord's remnants fall like fruit, the bamboo pavilion is cooled by the gentle rain. I feel ashamed to be an old and feeble person, seeing your soaring wings reaching for the sky.

poem:
清辰捲珠簾，盥漱香滿室。
杉松經雪後，別有精彩出。
琅函芙蓉書，開之向堦日。
好鳥常解來，孤雲偶相失。
有時作章句，氣概還鮮逸。
茫茫世情世，誰人愛真實。
清高慕玄度，宴默攀道一。
殘磬隔風林，微陽解冰筆。
亦知休明代，諒無經濟術。
門前九箇峯，終擬爲文乞。
translate: In the clear morning, I roll up the pearl-adorned curtain; the fragrance of my ablutions fills the room. The cedars and pines have emerged with new vitality after the snowfall. I open the jade-inlaid lotus-patterned book, facing the steps. The beautiful birds occasionally come, while the solitary clouds sometimes lose their way. Sometimes I compose verses, my breath still fresh and free. In the vast world, who loves truth? I admire the lofty spirit of Xuan De, striving to climb the path of Tao. The remaining bell echoes through the wind-swept woods, as the faint sunlight melts the ice from my writing brush. I know that in the prosperous Ming Dynasty, there will be no more economic strategies. Before my door, there are nine peaks, which I plan to use for literary purposes.

poem:
冷冽蒼黃風似劈，雪骨冰筋滿瑤席。
庭松流汙相抵喫，霜絮重裘火無力。
孤峯地鑪燒白櫪，龐眉道者應相憶。
儵忽維陽歲云暮，寂寥不覺成章句。
惟應將寄蘂珠宮，禪剎雲深一來否。
translate: The chilly and yellow wind cuts like an axe, with snow bones and ice tendons filling the jade mat. The court pines flow with dirt to eat, and the frost cotton and heavy fur are too cold for the fire. The solitary peak's earth furnace burns the white cedar, and the thick-browed monk should be remembered. Suddenly, the Vilyagong year is nearing its end, and the lonely silence doesn't even notice the verses. Only by sending a message to the pearl palace, is there any chance of visiting the deep clouds in the Zen temple?

poem:
有叟傲堯日，髮白肌膚紅。
妻子亦讀書，種蘭清溪東。
白雲有奇色，紫桂含天風。
即應迎鶴書，肯羨於洞洪。
translate: An old man is proud of the day of Yao, with white hair and red skin. His wife also reads books, cultivating orchids on the east bank of the clear creek. The white clouds have unusual colors, and the purple cinnamon contains the wind of heaven. Immediately welcome the crane's writing, would envy the hole pond.

poem:
高步前山前，高歌北山北。
數載賣甘橙，山貲近云足。
新詩不將出，往往僧乞得。
唯云李太白，亦是偷桃賊。
吟狂鬼神走，酒釅天地[黑]。
青芻生堦除，擷之束成束。
translate: Walking and singing in the northern mountains, selling sweet oranges for years. The mountain's wealth is close to enough clouds. New poems are not yet published, often begged from monks. Only knowing Li Taibai was also a peach thief. Singing wildly, the gods and ghosts run, and the world and the earth are drenched in wine. Green straw grows at the edge of the stairs, gathered into bundles.

poem:
今人看此月，古人看此月。
如何古人心，難向今人說。
古人求祿以及親，及之如之何。
忠孝爲朱輪，今人求祿唯庇身。
庇身如之何，惡木多斜文。
斜文復斜文，顛窒何紛紛。
translate: The people of today look at this moon, as the ancients looked at this moon. How can the thoughts of the ancients be explained to the people of today? The ancients sought wealth and prosperity for their families, but how could they achieve it? Loyalty and filial piety were like a red wheel, while the people of today seek wealth and prosperity only for their own benefit. How can they achieve it? There are many crooked patterns in the evil wood. The crooked patterns repeat themselves, and the confusion is endless.

poem:
風裁日染開仙囿，百花色死猩血謬。
今朝一朵墮堦前，應有看人怨孫秀。
translate: The wind and the sun open the fairy garden, where a hundred flowers wither like blood. Today, one flower falls at my feet, making me lament for Sun Xu.

poem:
聖主得賢臣，天地方交泰。
恭惟嶽精粹，多出於昭代。
君侯握文鏡，獨立塵埃外。
王演俗容儀，崔陵小風概。
馨香擁蘭雪，峻秀高嵩岱。
嵇松領歲寒，莊劒無礱淬。
威稜玉霜直，匠石金槌大。
詩穿明月珠，道拍安期背。
中興鸞鳳集，直道風雲會。
萬卷似無書，三山如歷塊。
德乎天所縱，清矣誰堪對。
有法在朝端，無塵到冠蓋。
具瞻從密勿，旦夕調鼎鼐。
爲君整衢尊，爲君戢蕃塞。
豈知吾后意，憂此毘陵最。
親手賜彤弓，蒼生是繄賴。
下車鄰寇散，是物冰壺內。
龔遂[愛]廉平，次公太繁碎。
袴襦砧動地，父母歌闤闠。
□雪鏁戈鋋，非煙遶旌斾。
寧思子產冰，肯羨任棠薤。
忽如春再來，不獨天重戴。
昂藏海嶠鶴，冷碧仙庭檜。
物物動和氣，家家有新態。
芙蓉開帟幕，錦帳無纖壒。
鼓角穿凍雲，恩波動耕耒。
奸回改精魄，禮教書紳帶。
必于堯舜日，還似房杜輩。
野人有章句，格力亦慷慨。
若不入丘門，世間更誰愛。
translate: The holy monarch has obtained wise ministers, and the land is at peace. Respectfully considering the essence of the mountains, it mostly comes from the bright age. The lord holds the literary mirror, standing alone outside the dust. The king demonstrates worldly manners and ceremonies, and Cui Ling has a slight breeze. Fragrant orchids and snow embrace each other, and the steep and elegant peaks of Mount Tai are high. Ji Song leads the cold winter, and Zhuang's sword does not rust. The aura of jade frost is straight, and the master stone's gold hammer is large. The poem passes through the moon-like pearls, and the Taoist beat the Anqi back. The revival of the phoenix gathering, the straight path of the wind and clouds meeting. Ten thousand volumes seem to have no books, and the three mountains seem to pass through the blocks. Virtue is what heaven allows, who can be clean and clear to face? There is a law in the government, there is no dust on the hat and robe. Everyone looks forward to secrecy, and adjusts the ding and nai during the day and night. For the emperor to arrange the honorific, for the emperor to subdue the border. How can they know my intentions, worrying about this most in Pyongyang. He personally gave the red bow, and the people are dependent on it. When the enemy disperses next to the carriage, it is as if it is in the ice pot. Gong Yu loves integrity and fairness, and the second gentleman is too complicated. The pants and quilts are moving on the ground, and the parents are singing in the market. Snow locks the weapons, smoke surrounds the flag. Do you think of Zi Cheng's ice, or admire Ren Tang's onion? Suddenly like spring again, not just heaven's heavy burden. Proud and open as the sea ridge crane, cold and green as the fairy court cypress. Everything moves with harmony, every family has a new attitude. The lotus opens the tent screen, and the silk quilt is without any dust. The drum and gong pass through the frozen clouds, and the graceful waves move the ploughshare. Evil returns to refine its spirit, and the book of etiquette teaches the silk ribbon belt. Certainly in Yao and Shun's day, it will be like Fang and Du's generation. A wild man has a few lines, and his temperament is also generous. If he doesn't enter the hill gate, who else in the world will love him?

poem:
一公何不在，空有遠公名。
共說岑山路，今時不可行。
舊房松更老，新塔草初生。
經論傳緇侶，文章遍墨卿。
禪林枝幹折，法宇棟梁傾。
誰俊修僧史，應知傳已成。
translate: What has the public done, leaving only a famous name? It is said that the Cen Mountain Road is no longer passable. The old pines in the abandoned house have grown older, and the new tower is surrounded by budding grass. The scriptural discussions are passed on to the black-robed disciples, and the articles are written for the ink-drenched officials. The branches and trunks of the Zen forest are broken, and the pillars and beams of the dharma hall are leaning. Who will diligently record the monk's history, knowing that it has already been passed down?

poem:
君不見山高海深人不測，古往今來轉青碧。
淺近輕浮莫與交，地卑只解生荆棘。
誰道黃金如糞土，張耳陳餘斷消息。
行路難，行路難，君自看。
translate: You do not see the high mountains and deep seas, where people's hearts are unknowable, with the past and present turning green and blue. Do not associate with those who are shallow and frivolous, for they only create thorns in lowly places. Who would have thought that gold is like dung, as Zhang Yi and Chen Yu's news has been cut off. The road is difficult, the road is difficult, you must see it for yourself.

poem:
不會當時作天地，剛有多般愚與智。
到頭還用真宰心，何如上下皆清氣。
大道冥冥不知處，那堪頓得羲和轡。
義不義兮仁不仁，擬學長生更容易。
負心爲罏復爲火，緣木求魚應且止。
君不見燒金煉石古帝王，鬼火熒熒白楊裏。
translate:
At first, we did not know the heavens and the earth,
Only fools and wise men in various forms.
In the end, we rely on the true ruler's heart,
How can it be with clear energy up and down?
The great path is hidden and unknown,
Unable to grasp the reins of the sun and the moon.
Right and wrong, kindness and cruelty,
Seeking longevity for easier learning.
Using the heart as a furnace and fire,
Stop seeking fish through trees.
You do not see the ancient emperors burning gold and refining stone,
Ghostly flames flickering among poplars.

poem:
君不見道傍廢井生古木，本是驕奢貴人屋。
幾度美人照影來，素綆銀缾濯纖玉。
雲飛雨散今如此，繡闥雕甍作荒谷。
沸渭笙歌君莫誇，不應常是西家哭。
休誰遺編行者幾，至竟終須合天理。
敗他成此亦何功，蘇張終作多言鬼。
行路難，行路難，不在羊腸裏。
translate: Do you not see the abandoned wells beside the path, where ancient trees have grown? They were once the luxurious mansions of the proud and extravagant nobles. Several times, beauties came to bathe in the water, their fine silk and silver pitchers washing away their delicate skin. Now, as clouds scatter and rain dissipates, the ornate gates and carvings have become a desolate valley. Don't boast about the lively music and songs that once filled these places - they should not be a source of constant sorrow for the west. Do not neglect the few who have left their legacy, for eventually, everything must conform to the natural order. What achievement is there in destroying one thing to create another? Su Zhang will always be known as a talkative ghost. The road is difficult, the road is difficult, it is not in the tortuous paths.

poem:
九有茫茫共堯日，浪死虛生亦非一。
清淨玄音竟不聞，花眼酒腸暗如漆。
或偶因片言隻字登第光二親，又不能獻可替否航要津。
口譚羲軒與周孔，履行不及屠沽人。
行路難，行路難，日暮途遠空悲歎。
translate: In the vastness of the nine worlds, sharing the day with Yao, the endless flow of life and death is not uncommon. The clear and pure mystic sound is never heard, and the flowers in our eyes and wine in our stomachs are as dark as lacquer. Occasionally, we ascend the list through a single word or phrase, but we cannot offer our services or replace them at critical junctures. We talk about Xi and Zhou Kong, but our actions do not match those of the butchers and wine merchants. It's difficult to walk, it's difficult to walk, as the sun sets and the journey grows longer, empty sighs fill the air.

poem:
君不見道傍樹有寄生枝，青青鬱鬱同榮衰。
無情之物尚如此，爲人不及還堪悲。
父歸墳兮未朝夕，已分黃金爭田宅。
高堂老母頭似霜，心作數支淚常滴。
我聞忽如負芒刺，不獨爲君空歎息。
古人尺布猶可縫，潯陽義犬令人憶。
寄言世上爲人子，孝義團圓莫如此。
若如此，不遄死兮更何俟。
translate: Do you not see the parasitic branches on the roadside trees, green and lush, sharing in their glory and decline? Even inanimate objects have such feelings; it is unbearable for humans to be even more sad. My father has returned to his grave, but I haven't seen him for days; already, people compete for gold and property. My elderly mother's head is like frost, her heart weeps like a fountain of tears. I hear it suddenly, as if I were carrying a thorny burden; I sigh not only for you but also for myself. The ancient cloth can still be mended, the loyal dog in Xindu makes us remember. Send a message to all human children: filial piety and righteousness should be complete, no matter what. If so, why wait for anything else except death?

poem:
岸如洞庭山似剡，船漾清溪涼勝簟。
月白風高不得眠，枯葦叢邊釣師魘。
translate: The bank is like the Dongting Mountain, and the boat wades through the clear creek, cooler than a mat. The moon is bright and the wind high, making it impossible to sleep. By the withered reeds, the fisherman is caught in a trance.

poem:
葦蕭蕭，風摵摵，落日江頭何處客。
斜倚帆檣不喚人，五湖浪向心中白。
translate: The reeds are whispering, the wind is rustling, where is the traveler by the setting sun on the river bank. Leaning against the sail and masts, he does not call for help, as the waves of the Five Lakes flow through his heart.

poem:
梅月多開戶，衣裳潤欲滴。
寂寥雖無形，不是小讐敵。
地虛草木壯，雨白桃李赤。
永日無人來，庭花苦狼籍。
吟高好鳥覷，風靜茶煙直。
唯思萊子來，衣拖五般色。
translate: The moon of plum blossoms opens many doors, clothes moisten droplets. Lonely though invisible, it is not a small enemy. The earth is empty, the grass and trees are strong, the rain is white, peach and li is red. No one comes all day, the court flowers suffer from chaos. Singing high, good birds look, the wind is quiet, tea smoke is straight. I only think of Lai Zi coming, his clothes dragging five colors.

poem:
撐船碧江上，春日何遲遲。
汀花最深處，拾得鴛鴦兒。
translate: Paddling on the azure river, why is spring so slow? In the deepest reed flowers, picking up the mandarin duck's young.

poem:
漁父無憂苦，水仙亦何別。
眠在綠葦邊，不知釣筒發。
translate: The fisherman has no worries, and the water nymphs have no differences. Sleeping by the green reeds, he does not know the fishing pole is cast.

poem:
樵叟無憂苦，地仙亦何別。
茆屋岸花中，弄孫頭似雪。
translate: The woodcutter has no worries, and the earthly immortal is no different. In the marsh hut by the flowers, he plays with his grandson, whose head is as white as snow.

poem:
扣舷得新詩，茶煮桃花水。
㠔㠔數片帆，去去殊未已。
translate: New poems are found by tapping the ship's side, and tea is brewed from peach blossom water. A few pieces of sail flutter, and they keep moving without stopping

poem:
仁政無不及，乳獺將子行。
誰家苦竹林，中有讀書聲。
translate: The benevolent government extends to all, as otters guide their young. In the bamboo forest of a certain home, there echoes with the sound of reading.

poem:
我愛正考甫，思賢作商頌。
我愛揚子雲，理亂皆如鳳。
振衣中夜起，露花香旖旎。
撲碎驪龍明月珠，敲出鳳皇五色髓。
陋巷蕭蕭風㭊㭊，緬想斯人勝珪璧。
寂寥千載不相逢，無限區區盡虛擲。
君不見沈約道，佳人不在茲，春光爲誰惜。
translate: My love for Zheng Kao-fu, I sing the praises of the wise. My love for Yang Zi-yun, in chaos and order like a phoenix. I rise at midnight to shake off my clothes, the dew and fragrant flowers are enchanting. Crushing the moon-like pearls of the li dragon, tapping out the five-colored marrow of the phoenix. In the desolate alley, the wind whispers, remembering this person is better than jade and crystal. Lonely for a thousand years, we never meet, endless vanity is wasted. You do not see Shen Yue's words, the beauty is no longer here, who cherishes the spring scenery for whom?

poem:
安得龍猛筆，點石爲黃金。
散爲酷吏家，使無貪殘心。
甘棠密葉成翠幄，欵鳳不來天地塞。
所以傾國傾城人，如今如今不可得。
translate: How can one obtain a dragon's fierce pen, to turn stone into gold? Spread it throughout the cruel officials' homes, so they have no more greed and cruelty in their hearts. The sweet elm leaves form a green canopy, but the graceful phoenixes are barred from entering this world. Therefore, those who once captivated the nation and people are now irreplaceable.

poem:
古塞腥膻地，胡兵聚如蠅。
寒鵰中𩩉石，落在黃河冰。
蒼茫邏逤城，枿枿賊氣興。
鑄金禱秋穹，還擬相憑陵。
translate: The ancient fortress, filled with the stench of rot, gathers the barbarian soldiers like flies. The cold hawk perches on a boulder in the middle of the Yellow River ice. The vast Lashou city, with its persistent enemy atmosphere. Casting gold to pray for the autumn sky, planning to launch another assault.

poem:
戰骨踐成塵，飛入征人目。
黃雲忽變黑，戰鬼作陣哭。
陰風吼大漠，火號出不得。
誰爲天子前，唱此邊城曲。
translate: The battle bones have turned to dust, flying into the eyes of the soldiers. The yellow clouds suddenly turn black, and the war ghosts cry out in formation. The dark wind roars across the vast desert, and the signal fires cannot be lit. Who is singing this frontier city song before the emperor?

poem:
日向平沙出，還向平沙沒。
飛蓬落軍營，驚鵰去天末。
帝鄉青樓倚霄漢，歌吹掀天對花月。
豈知塞上望鄉人，日日雙眸滴清血。
translate: The sun rises on the level sand, and disappears into the level sand again. Wild strawberries fall in the military camp, and the astonished eagle flies to the end of heaven. The imperial city's green tower leans against the sky, and the songs and blowing stir the heavens as they face the flowers and the moon. How can one know that those who watch their hometown from the frontier every day have tears of blood dripping from their eyes?

poem:
狼煙在陣雲，匈奴愛輕敵。
領兵不知數，牛羊復吞磧。
嚴冬大河枯，嫖姚去深擊。
戰血染黃沙，風吹暎天赤。
translate: In the array of billowing clouds, the wolf smoke rises. The Huns love to take lightly their enemy's might. The commander leads his troops without knowing their number, and the cattle and sheep graze once more on the desolate steppe. In the harsh winter, the great river dries up, and the valiant general marches deep into the enemy's territory. Battlesheds stain the yellow sands, as the wind blows through, reflecting the sky's crimson hue.

poem:
我昔不幸兮遭百罹，蒼蒼留我兮到好時。
耳聞鐘鼓兮生豐肌，白髮却黑兮自不知。
東鄰老人好吹笛，倉囤峨峨穀多赤。
餅紅鰕兮㭊麋腊，有酒如濁醯兮呼我喫。
往往醉倒潢洿之水邊兮人盡識，孰云六五帝兮四三皇。
如夔如龍羞如龔黃，吾不知此之言兮是何之言兮。
translate: In the past, I was unfortunate and suffered from countless trials. The vast sky left me until the right time. I heard the sound of bells and drums, which made my skin grow full and healthy. My white hair turned black, but I didn't realize it. The elderly neighbor to the east played the flute skillfully, and his granaries were tall with a lot of red grain. He offered me red shrimp cakes and jerky made from deer meat, along with wine that was like turbid vinegar. I often got drunk and fell beside the muddy water, where people recognized me. Who could have known about the six emperors and five emperors or the four sages? Some people are like Kuijin, Long, Xiu, and Gong Huang. I don't know what these words mean.

poem:
吾師楞伽山中人，氣岸古淡僧麒麟。
曹溪老兄一與語，金玉聲利。
泥棄唾委，兀兀如頑雲。
驪珠兮固難價其價，靈芝兮何以根其根。
真貌枯槁言樸略，衲衣爛黑燒嶽痕。
憶昔十四五年前苦寒節，禮師問師楞伽月。
此時師握玉麈尾，報我却云非日月。
一敲粉碎狂性歇，庭松無韻冷撼骨。
搔窗擦簷數枝雪，邇來流浪于吳越。
一片閑雲空皎潔，再來尋師已蟬蛻。
薝蔔枝枯醴泉竭，水檀香火遺影在。
甘露松枝月中折，寶師往日真隱心，今日不能墮雙血。
translate: My teacher is a person from the Ronggi Mountain, with an ancient and simple aura like a monk horse. When I talk to the elder brother of the Cao River, I hear the sound of gold and jade. He discards the mud and spit, as if he were a stubborn cloud. The pearls are hard to value, and the spirits can't explain their roots. His true appearance is dry and simple, and his habitual clothes are tattered and blackened by burning mountains. I recall the bitter cold days fourteen or fifteen years ago, when I paid homage to my teacher and asked about the Ronggi Moon. At that time, my teacher held a jade fly whisk, telling me that it was not the sun or the moon. After a knock, the crazy nature is shattered, and the court pines make no sound, chilling the bones. As I scratch and wipe the snow from the windows and eaves, I have been wandering in the Wu and Yue regions. A piece of empty white cloud, I have transformed again and come to seek my teacher. The yellow osmanthus branches are withered, and the sweet water springs are exhausted. The water sandalwood incense and fire traces are left behind. Breaking the sugi branch in the moonlight, the treasure teacher's previous true hidden heart cannot fall into twin blood today.

poem:
山無綠兮水無清，風既毒兮沙亦腥。
胡兒走馬疾飛鳥，聯翩射落雲中聲。
translate: The mountains have no green, and the water has no clarity. The wind is poisonous, and the sand is also foul-smelling. The Mongol children ride horses swiftly, shooting birds in pairs, their sounds echoing through the clouds.

poem:
陣雲忽向沙中起，探得胡兵過遼水。
堪嗟護塞征戍兒，未戰已疑身是鬼。
translate: Suddenly, the formation clouds rise from the sand; discovering the barbarian troops crossing the Liao River. Alas, the guards and soldiers protecting the border are already doubtful of their own existence before the battle begins.

poem:
見說青塚穴，中有白野狐。
時時出沙磧，向東而號呼。
號呼復號呼，畫師圖得無。
translate: It is said that there is a tomb in the green mound, where a white wild fox resides. It comes out from the sand dunes frequently, calling eastward. Calling and crying again and again, can it be captured by the artist's brush?

poem:
道之大道古太古，二字爲名爭莽鹵。
社稷安危在直言，須歷堯堦撾諫鼓。
恭聞吾皇至聖深無比，推席却几聽至理。
一言偶未合堯聰，賈生須看湘江水。
君不見頃者百官排闥赴延英，陽城不死存令名。
又不見仲尼遙奇司馬子，珮玉垂紳合如此。
公乎公乎施之掾，江上春風喜相見。
畏天之命復行行，芙蓉爲衣勝絁絹。
好音入耳應非久，三峽聞猨莫迴首。
且啜千年羹，醉巴酒。
translate: The great path of the Tao is ancient and primordial, with two characters creating a struggle for chaos. The safety of the nation lies in frank speech, requiring to pass through the steps of Yao and strike the drum of advice. I humbly hear that our emperor is the most holy and profound, relinquishing the throne and listening to the truth. If one word does not conform to Emperor Yao's wisdom, Jia Yan must gaze at the water of the Xiang River. You do not see the officials lining up to attend the Imperial Assembly, with Yang Cheng living on but maintaining his reputation. Nor do you see Confucius admiring Sima Yi from afar, with their jade ornaments and silk sashes matching each other. Be brave and put your talents to use, as the spring breeze welcomes you on the river. Fearing Heaven's will, continue forward, with the lotus as your clothing surpassing silk. Pleasant sounds should last for some time, as the monkeys in the Three Gorges do not turn back. Enjoy the thousand-year broth and the wine of Ba, becoming intoxicated.

poem:
茶烹綠乳花暎簾，撐沙苦筍銀纖纖。
窗中山色青翠黏，主人於我情無厭。
translate: Tea boiled into green milk, flowers reflecting through the curtain; Bamboo shoots, thin and silver, taste bitter in the sand. The green hills of the window, stuck to it, are so fresh and vivid; The owner's affection for me is endless and never tires.

poem:
白桑紅椹鶯咽咽，麵揉玉塵餅挑雪。
將爲數日已一月，主人於我特地切。
translate: White mulberries and red worms, warblers sing sweetly; flour is kneaded with jade dust, pie crusts are picked like snow. A few days have become a month, the host has specially prepared for me.

poem:
水嬌草媚掩山路，睡槎鴛鴦如畫作。
春光靄靄忽已暮，主人剛地不放去。
translate: Graceful water and charming grass cover the mountain path, sleeping ducks resemble painted mandarin ducks. Spring scenery is bright but soon fades into twilight, the host reluctantly allows us to leave

poem:
善爲爾諸身，行爲爾性命。
禍福必可轉，莫慤言前定。
見人之得，如己之得。
則美無不克，見人之失。
如己之失，是亨貞吉。
反此之徒，天鬼必誅。
福先禍始，好殺滅[紀]。
不得不止，守謙寡慾。
善善惡惡，不得不作。
無見貴熱，諂走蹩躠。
無輕賤微，上下相依。
古聖著書，矻矻孳孳。
忠孝信行，越食逾衣。
生天地間，未或非假。
身危彩虹，景速奔馬。
胡不自彊，將升玉堂。
胡爲自墜，言虛行僞。
豔殃爾壽須戒，酒腐爾腸須畏。
勵志須至，撲滿必破。
非莫非於餙非，過莫過於文過。
及物陰功，子孫必封。
無恃文學，是司奇薄。
患隨不忍，害逐無足。
一此一彼，諧宮合徵。
親仁下問，立節求己。
惡木之陰匪陰，盜泉之水匪水。
世孚草草，能生幾幾。
直須如冰如玉，種桃種李。
嫉人之惡，酬恩報義。
忽己之慢，成人之美。
毋擔虛譽，無背至理。
恬和愻暢，沖融終始。
天人之行，盡此而已。
丁寧丁寧，戴髮含齒。
translate:
Do well for yourself and your life, 
Act for your destiny. 
Good and evil can turn, don't believe it's predestined. 
See others' success as your own, then you can overcome all beauty. 
See others' failures as your own, this is a prosperous and virtuous omen. 
Those who oppose this will be punished by heaven.
